steps.name: Login as User(username:Roman Iovlev; password:p@s$w0rd) (Login Page Form)
Select 'AMOUNT' for 'Transactions Table header' (Transactions Table header)

Assert that 'Transactions Table' rows (a collection containing <Transaction(status:color=green;status=Complete; date:day=Today;time=1:52am; description:icon=company1.png;companyName=Starbucks coffee; category:badge=badge-success;value=Restaurant / Cafe; amount:type=text-success;value=+ 1,250.00 USD)> and a collection containing <Transaction(status:color=red;status=Declined; date:day=Jan 19th;time=3:22pm; description:icon=company2.png;companyName=Stripe Payment Processing; category:badge=badge-danger;value=Finance; amount:type=text-success;value=+ 952.23 USD)> and a collection containing <Transaction(status:color=yellow;status=Pending; date:day=Yesterday;time=7:45am; description:icon=company3.png;companyName=MailChimp Services; category:badge=badge-warning;value=Software; amount:type=text-danger;value=- 320.00 USD)> and a collection containing <Transaction(status:color=yellow;status=Pending; date:day=Jan 23rd;time=2:7pm; description:icon=company6.png;companyName=Shopify product; category:badge=badge-primary;value=Shopping; amount:type=text-success;value=+ 17.99 USD)> and a collection containing <Transaction(status:color=green;status=Complete; date:day=Jan 7th;time=9:51am; description:icon=company4.png;companyName=Ebay Marketplace; category:badge=badge-danger;value=Ecommerce; amount:type=text-danger;value=- 244.00 USD)> and a collection containing <Transaction(status:color=yellow;status=Pending; date:day=Jan 9th;time=7:45pm; description:icon=company7.png;companyName=Templates Inc; category:badge=badge-primary;value=Business; amount:type=text-success;value=+ 340.00 USD)>) (Transactions Table)
Assert that 'Transactions Table' is sorted (Transactions Table)
Assert that 'Transactions Table' row Description equals to other row (Transactions Table)
